Question: How do I reset my password?
Answer: Visit the login page, click 'Forgot Password,' and follow the instructions to reset it.

Question: Can I change my email address?
Answer: Yes, go to 'Account Settings' > 'Personal Information' to update your email.

Question: How do I delete my account?
Answer: Contact support via the 'Help Center' to request account deletion.

Question: Why was my payment declined?
Answer: Common reasons include insufficient funds or incorrect card details. Verify and try again.

Question: How long do refunds take?
Answer: Refunds typically process within 5-7 business days after approval.

Question: Can I use multiple payment methods?
Answer: Yes, during checkout select 'Split Payment' to use multiple options.

Question: Where is my order confirmation email?
Answer: Check your spam/junk folder. It’s sent immediately after purchase.

Question: How do I track my shipment?
Answer: Use the tracking number in your order confirmation email or account dashboard.

Question: What are your delivery hours?
Answer: Deliveries occur between 9 AM and 8 PM, Monday-Saturday.

Question: How do I return an item?
Answer: Initiate a return via the 'Order History' page and follow the instructions.

Question: What is your return window?
Answer: Returns are accepted within 30 days of delivery for unused items.

Question: How do I contact customer service?
Answer: Call 1-800-HELP or use the live chat option on our website.

Question: Do you offer international shipping?
Answer: Yes, we ship to 50+ countries. Check rates during checkout.

Question: Why is my order delayed?
Answer: Delays may occur due to weather, customs, or high demand. Check tracking for updates.

Question: Can I cancel an order?
Answer: Orders can be canceled within 1 hour of placement via 'Order History.

Question: How do I update my billing address?
Answer: Go to 'Payment Methods' in your account to edit billing details.

Question: Do you have a mobile app?
Answer: Yes, download it from the App Store or Google Play.

Question: How do I unsubscribe from emails?
Answer: Click 'Unsubscribe' at the bottom of any marketing email.

Question: Are my details secure?
Answer: We use SSL encryption and never share your data with third parties.

Question: What is two-factor authentication?
Answer: An extra security step requiring a code sent to your phone/email.

Question: How do I redeem a promo code?
Answer: Enter the code at checkout under 'Apply Discount.

Question: What’s your price match policy?
Answer: We match competitors’ prices within 48 hours of purchase. Contact us for details.

Question: Do you sell gift cards?
Answer: Yes, purchase digital or physical gift cards on our 'Gifts' page.

Question: Can I pre-order items?
Answer: Yes, select items labeled 'Pre-Order' will ship on their release date.

Question: What if an item is out of stock?
Answer: Sign up for restock alerts on the product page.

Question: Do you offer warranties?
Answer: Most products include a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Check product details.

Question: How do I apply for a job?
Answer: Visit our Careers page to view openings and submit an application.

Question: Where is your company located?
Answer: Our headquarters are in San Francisco, CA. See the Contact Us page for details.

Question: How do I report a bug?
Answer: Email support@example.com with 'Bug Report' in the subject line.

Question: What browsers do you support?
Answer: We support Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge (latest versions).

Question: Why is the website slow?
Answer: Clear your browser cache or try accessing it from a different device.

Question: Do you have a loyalty program?
Answer: Yes! Earn points with every purchase. Learn more in the 'Rewards' section.

Question: How do I check my reward points?
Answer: Log in and visit the 'Rewards Dashboard' in your account.

Question: Can I transfer my reward points?
Answer: Points are non-transferable and tied to your account.

Question: What’s your privacy policy?
Answer: Read our full policy here: https://example.com/privacy.

Question: Do you partner with charities?
Answer: Yes, 1% of all sales go to our nonprofit partners. Learn more here.

Question: Are products tested on animals?
Answer: We are a cruelty-free brand and never test on animals.

Question: Do you offer student discounts?
Answer: Yes! Verify your student status with SheerID for a 10% discount.

Question: Can I change my order’s shipping address?
Answer: Contact support immediately if the order hasn’t shipped.

Question: What’s your exchange policy?
Answer: Exchanges are free within 14 days. Start the process in 'Order History.

Question: How do I leave a product review?
Answer: Log in, go to the product page, and click 'Write a Review.

Question: Are your products eco-friendly?
Answer: All items are made with 100% recycled materials.

Question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
Answer: Contact sales@example.com for bulk pricing.

Question: What payment methods do you accept?
Answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

Question: Is my payment information saved?
Answer: Card details are encrypted and never stored unless you opt in.

Question: How do I update my phone number?
Answer: Go to 'Account Settings' > 'Personal Information' to edit it.

Question: What’s your customer service hours?
Answer: Support is available 24/7 via live chat and phone.

Question: Do you have a physical store?
Answer: We’re online-only but offer free returns at partnered retail locations.

Question: Can I donate my reward points?
Answer: Yes! Redeem points for charity donations in the Rewards Dashboard.

Question: How do I reset two-factor authentication?
Answer: Contact support for verification to reset your 2FA settings.

Question: Can I pause my subscription?
Answer: Yes, go to 'Subscriptions' in your account to pause or skip a month.
